attributes.action: Encourage British Manufacturers - create a Care Trade Trust
attributes.additional_details:
We already have Fair Trade items.  What about creating a Care Trade Trust, a non profit making organisation which British manufacturers can join.
Only manufacturers based in Britain (including Scotland, Ireland and Wales) and using components completely sourced in Britain should be eligible to join,  The members should be charged a small amount to join which in turn can be used to provide funding for new businesses.
British people care about their country.  Give people the opportunity to easily identify those products which provide jobs and get this country back on its feet.
